structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Traveling, Clerical And Other Expenses Of Supervisor
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] The secretary may expend not more than three thousand dollars annually for such traveling, clerical and other necessary expenses in connection with the duties required of the supervisor of public records under chapter sixty-six as the governor and council may approve. Chapter 9: Traveling, clerical and other expenses of supervisor [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 85 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] The secretary may expend not more than three thousand dollars annually for such traveling, clerical and other necessary expenses in connection with the duties required of the supervisor of public records under chapter 66.
